tool_description: Analyzes collected data to identify and prioritize community needs, generating actionable insights for program planning.

survey_responses.description: Array of survey response texts or numerical ratings

focus_group_data.description: Key findings or quotes from focus group sessions

demographic_data.description: Demographic information about the target population

prioritization_method.description: Method for prioritizing needs: frequency, urgency, or impact

error_messages: Empty survey responses: Provide at least one survey response in the array.
Invalid prioritization method: Use one of [frequency, urgency, impact].
Insufficient data quality: Survey responses must be meaningful text or numerical values, not empty strings.
usage: Input survey responses and optionally focus group data and demographics. Choose prioritization method to rank identified needs. Tool analyzes patterns and generates prioritized community needs list.

prioritized_needs.description: List of community needs ranked by priority

needs_analysis.description: Detailed analysis of identified needs and their relationships

target_populations.description: Identified groups most affected by the needs
